statements: SELECT * FROM RecyclingMonitoring ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location, recycling_type, weight FROM RecyclingMonitoring WHERE collection_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, location FROM RecyclingMonitoring WHERE recycling_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY collection_date ASC;
SELECT id, weight FROM RecyclingMonitoring WHERE location = 'City Center' AND recycling_type = 'Glass';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMonitoring WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMonitoring WHERE collection_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, location, SUM(weight) AS total_weight FROM RecyclingMonitoring GROUP BY id, location
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM RecyclingMonitoring WHERE recycling_type = 'paper' GROUP BY location
SELECT id, location, recycling_type FROM RecyclingMonitoring ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT recycling_type FROM RecyclingMonitoring
SELECT * FROM RecycleCenters;
SELECT id, name, location FROM RecycleCenters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM RecycleCenters ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE recycling_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT material_name, recycling_type, recycle_center_id FROM RecyclingMaterials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT name, location FROM RecycleCenters WHERE capacity > 100
SELECT * FROM RecyclingMaterials WHERE recycling_type = 'plastic' ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM RecycleCenters WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California'
SELECT r.material_name, r.recycling_type, rc.location FROM RecyclingMaterials r JOIN RecycleCenters rc ON r.recycle_center_id = rc.id
SELECT r.material_name, rc.location FROM RecyclingMaterials r JOIN RecycleCenters rc ON r.recycle_center_id = rc.id WHERE r.recycle_center_id = 1
SELECT * FROM monitoring;
SELECT location, sensor_type, reading FROM monitoring ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_strategies WHERE location='City Center';
SELECT DISTINCT strategy_name, materials_accepted FROM recycling_strategies;
SELECT product_name, production_site FROM circular_economy WHERE carbon_footprint < 50;
SELECT * FROM monitoring WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_type, reading FROM monitoring WHERE reading > 100 ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, contact_person FROM recycling_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%recycling%' AND materials_accepted IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, recycled_materials FROM circular_economy WHERE carbon_footprint < 5.0 ORDER BY product_name ASC, carbon_footprint DESC;

SELECT id, location, reading, timestamp FROM monitoring JOIN recycling_strategies ON monitoring.location = recycling_strategies.location WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND strategy_name = 'Recycle Now';
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenter;
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM RecyclingCenter WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, location FROM RecyclingCenter WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenter ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(capacity) AS total_capacity FROM RecyclingCenter GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenter ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM RecyclingCenter WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT r.name AS MaterialName, rs.total_recycled_quantity AS TotalQuantity FROM RecyclingMaterial r, RecyclingStatistics rs WHERE r.id = rs.material_id;

SELECT rt.id AS TransactionID, rt.transaction_date AS Date, r.name AS MaterialName, rc.name AS CenterName, rt.quantity AS Quantity FROM RecyclingTransaction rt JOIN RecyclingMaterial r ON rt.material_id = r.id JOIN RecyclingCenter rc ON rt.center_id = rc.id ORDER BY rt.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT rm.name AS MaterialName, rt.quantity AS Quantity, rc.location AS CenterLocation, rst.total_amount_earned AS TotalEarned FROM RecyclingMaterial rm JOIN RecyclingTransaction rt ON rm.id = rt.material_id JOIN RecyclingCenter rc ON rt.center_id = rc.id JOIN RecyclingStatistics rst ON rm.id = rst.material_id WHERE rt.quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_goods;
SELECT id, product_name FROM monitoring_goods WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location, product_name, quantity FROM monitoring_goods ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recycling_centers WHERE capacity >= 1000 ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT id, material_name, material_type FROM recycling_materials WHERE recyclable = true;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_goods ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, capacity, center_name FROM recycling_centers WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY center_name;
SELECT material_name, recyclable FROM recycling_materials WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, description, implementation_date FROM circular_economy_strategies WHERE implementation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT rule_name, rule_criteria FROM sorting_rules WHERE rule_description LIKE '%recycle%' ORDER BY rule_name ASC;
